Module: geometry

geometry

Geometry external API. Assign "Dynamic geometry" option on objects to allow geometry modification.
Source:
  • ext/geometry.js, line 3

Methods

<static> extract_index_array(obj, mat_name)

Extract array of triangulated face indices from given object.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
obj Object ID
mat_name String Material name
